sentence.Network_en: Some of the cationic proteins are bactericidal.
sentence.Network_cn: 一些阳离子蛋白质是能杀菌的.

sentence.Network_en: Potent intracellular bactericidal action may be exerted through the myeloperoxidase - hydrogen peroxide - halide bactericidal system.
sentence.Network_cn: 强烈的胞内杀菌作用可以通过骨髓过氧化物酶 - 过氧化氢 - 卤素杀菌系统发挥威力.

sentence.Network_en: Polyiodides have important applications in the bactericidal and electric fields.
sentence.Network_cn: 它在杀菌和导电方面都有着重要应用.
